properties.areaDesc: Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 8 at 3:11PM CST until February 9 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas 5 to 7 feet expected with occasional seas to 9 feet.

* WHERE...Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas from 20 to 60
NM and Waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel from
20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong to very strong winds and/or increased seas
will result in hazardous marine conditions especially for
inexperienced mariners with smaller vessels.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST SUNDAY
